document_data.caption: A map showing the Shyok Muren flowing south of Skarou.
document_data.name: Shyok Muren
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shyok Muren''' was a small river found in [[Khazari]].
document_data.Geography: The Shyok Muren originated within a branch of the [[Katakoro Shan]] mountains in southeastern Khazari. It flowed northwest down from the mountains through central Khazari, passing by the capital of [[Skarou]] before joining with the mighty [[Jumpa River]].
